about_the_game:
Unleash new bonuses and dominate the game - upgrade now!

Our new animal companions are here to take your gameplay to the next level by providing you with new bonuses such as increased basket capacity and faster experience gain. With Working animals DLC you'll be able to collect more items and level up faster than ever before!

And as a bonus, we're giving you +500 diamonds to help you get started. Use them to buy one of these amazing creatures and start experiencing the benefits right away.

Don't miss out on the chance to upgrade your game and experience the joy of having your own loyal companions by your side. Get your copy of Working animals DLC today and take your gameplay to the next level!
detailed_description:
Unleash new bonuses and dominate the game - upgrade now!

Our new animal companions are here to take your gameplay to the next level by providing you with new bonuses such as increased basket capacity and faster experience gain. With Working animals DLC you'll be able to collect more items and level up faster than ever before!

And as a bonus, we're giving you +500 diamonds to help you get started. Use them to buy one of these amazing creatures and start experiencing the benefits right away.

Don't miss out on the chance to upgrade your game and experience the joy of having your own loyal companions by your side. Get your copy of Working animals DLC today and take your gameplay to the next level!
name: Dig Deep: Chunky Pets

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 2.8 GHz
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 950
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 5 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 11
  • Processor: 3.5 GHz
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 950
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 5 MB available space

short_description: Unleash new bonuses and dominate the game - upgrade now!
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Korean, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Turkish
